attributes.action: Abolish or revise the Working Holidaymaker scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the WHM scheme allows young Commonwealth Citizens to come to the UK. Applicants skills (or lack of them) are not taken into account during applications. A requirement should also be levied that a person can speak English before they come to the UK.

UK citizens are let down by the strain on resources when foreign nationals with little skills are granted entry clearance
